__e: But I'm here now to get to know you, see if I can make it up to you.
But just don't give me some bullshit about how you forgive me and then dredge up shit from the past that I can't possibly fix! That's not forgiveness!
But just tell me whatever amends I need to make, or whatever bridges I need to build, and let's... let's get back to the way things were.
